name: Abra
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. Even when awake, it teleports itself while remaining seated.

attacks.name: Play Search
attacks.effect: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other 4 cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Ultra Evolution
attacks.effect: Search your deck for Alakazam and put it on Abra (this counts as evolving Abra). Shuffle your deck afterward.
